changeSet.author: hparry
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE ruleform.agency_product ( id bigserial NOT NULL, agency bigint NOT NULL, relationship bigint NOT NULL, product bigint NOT NULL, notes character varying, updated_by bigint NOT NULL, update_date timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT ('NOW'::text)::timestamp(6) with time zone, CONSTRAINT agency_product_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id ), CONSTRAINT agency_product_product_fkey FOREIGN KEY (product) REFERENCES ruleform.product (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT agency_product_relationship_fkey FOREIGN KEY (relationship) REFERENCES ruleform.relationship (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT agency_product_agency_fkey FOREIGN KEY (agency) REFERENCES ruleform.agency (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT agency_product_updated_by_fkey FOREIGN KEY (updated_by) REFERENCES ruleform.agency (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT agency_product_agency_key UNIQUE (agency , relationship , product ) ) WITH ( OIDS=FALSE );
